snippet: A study has found that in women at high risk of premature birth, a pessary may delay birth until a newborn has a greater chance of survival.
abstract: Study published in The Lancet finds that a pessary, small silicon collar placed around the neck of the cervix, may delay birth until a newborn has a greater chance of survival in women at high risk of premature birth.
lead_paragraph: A study has found that in women at high risk of premature birth, a pessary may delay birth until a newborn has a greater chance of survival.

headline.seo: Pessary Delays Births In Mothers at Risk of Premature Delivery
headline.main: Simple Device Helps Delay Birth to Lift Babies’ Chances of Survival
headline.print_headline: Pregnancy: Simple Device Helps Delay Birth To Lift Babies’ Chances of Survival
